TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataSourceSelectArguments extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种机制，数据绑定控件可使用这种机制向数据源控件请求在检索数据之后执行与数据相关的操作。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that data-bound controls use to request data-related operations from data source controls when data is retrieved.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用 类请求数据源控件对结果集执行与数据相关的其他操作，例如，对数据进行排序或返回特定的数据子集。Data-bound controls use the class to request that a data source control performs additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data. 这些与数据相关的操作通过枚举枚举 。These data-related operations are enumerated by the enumeration. 下表指示 类如何支持这些与数据相关的操作。The following table indicates how the class supports these data-related operations. |功能Capability|相关 DataSourceSelectArguments 属性Related DataSourceSelectArguments properties| |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| ||| ||, , | ||, , | 数据绑定控件显式调用 方法来绑定数据，这将调用 与它们关联的数据源控件的方法。Data-bound controls explicitly call the method to bind data, which calls the method of the data source control they are associated with. 通过这种方式，数据绑定控件按需从数据源控件检索数据。In this way, the data-bound control retrieves data from the data source control on demand. 由于 方法接受 参数，因此数据绑定控件负责创建和管理 对象，并 在从数据源控件检索数据时将该对象传递给方法。Because the method accepts a parameter, the data-bound control is responsible for creating and managing a object and passing it to the method when it retrieves data from the data source control. 在某些情况下，数据绑定控件可能不需要任何其他数据相关功能。In some cases, data-bound controls might not need any additional data-related capabilities. 在这种情况下，数据绑定控件 将参数对象传递给 方法。In this case, data-bound controls pass an arguments object to the method. 对于排序的结果集，数据绑定控件将在运行时检查数据源视图的 属性，并 使用方法添加功能 。For sorted result sets, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以通过对 传递给方法的对象设置属性，从数据源控件请求排序的结果集 。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a sorted result set from a data source control by setting the property on the object passed to the method. 对于分页方案，数据绑定控件将在运行时检查数据源视图的 属性，并 使用方法添加功能 。For paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 作为单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以通过设置 传递给方法的对象的和属性，从数据源控件请求数据的子集进行分页 。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method. 若要检索分页方案的总行数，数据绑定控件将在运行时检查数据源视图的 属性，并 使用方法添加功能 。To retrieve a total row count for paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method. 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以通过对 传递给方法的对象设置属性，从数据源控件请求汇总行计数 。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a total row count from a data source control for paging by setting the property on the object passed to the method. 当该 方法返回时，由属性包含总行数 。When the method returns, the total row count is contained by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果设置了任何 属性，但当前绑定的数据源控件不支持所请求的功能，则 调用方法时将引发异常 。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddSupportedCapabilities(valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities capabilities) cil managed

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 向 实例添加一个功能，用于对支持的功能和请求的功能进行比较。

span.span: Adds one capability to the instance, which is used to compare supported capabilities and requested capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源控件 为数据源支持的每个功能调用方法。Data source controls call the method for each capability the data source supports. 添加功能后，对方法的任何调用会将 受支持的功能与 (通过设置 、 、 和 属性) 进行表示。After the capabilities are added, any call to the method compares the supported capabilities against the requested capabilities (represented by setting the , , , and properties). 例如，如果未添加功能（如） ，但设置了 属性，则该 方法将引发 异常。For example, if a capability such as is not added but the property is set, the method throws a exception.

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回 使用默认构造函数创建的对象 。The property returns a object created with the default constructor. 如果希望在 不使用任何其他参数的情况下调用数据源视图类的方法，则可以使用属性。You can use the property when you want to call the method of a data source view class without any additional arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写 方法，以便使用对象的各种属性测试相等性。The class overrides the method to test equality using the various properties of the objects. 如果 、、 、 和属性的 值都相等，则该方法将 返回 `true` 。If the , , , , and properties are all equal in value, the method returns `true`.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示在一次数据检索操作中，数据源控件返回的最大数据行数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum number of data rows that a data source control returns for a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 在一次数据检索操作中，数据源返回的最大数据行数。

span.span: The maximum number of data rows that a data source returns for a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示返回所有可能的数据行。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that all possible data rows are returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 数据绑定控件在运行时检查数据源视图的 属性， 如果视图支持分页，则使用方法添加功能。Data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method if the view supports paging. 如果数据绑定控件未能添加功能，并且在 数据检索操作过程中在传递到数据源视图的对象上设置分页属性，则 可能会引发异常。If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an exception might be thrown. 数据绑定控件可以通过设置 传递给方法的对象的和属性，请求数据源控件中的数据子集进行分页 。The data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果设置了任何 属性，但当前绑定的数据源控件不支持所请求的功能，则 调用方法时将引发异常 。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError(class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView view) cil managed

param.name: view
param.span: 执行数据检索操作的数据源视图。

span.span: The data source view that performs the data retrieval operation.

summary.span: 将为 操作请求的功能与指定的数据源视图所支持的功能进行比较。

span.span: Compares the capabilities requested for an operation against those that the specified data source view supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用方法来比较类的属性表示的其他请求功能 ，如使用数据源视图所支持的功能对结果集进行排序或分页的能力。The method is used by data-bound controls to compare additional requested capabilities represented by the properties of the class, such as the ability to sort or page through a result set, with the capabilities supported by the data source view. 视图 为枚举中定义的每个可能的功能调用其自己的方法 。The view calls its own method for each possible capability defined in the enumeration. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果设置了任何 属性，但当前绑定的数据源控件不支持所请求的功能，则 调用方法时将引发异常 。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

exception.span: 数据源视图不支持指定的数据源功能。

span.span: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RetrieveTotalRowCount { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RetrieveTotalRowCount : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据检索操作过程中，数据源控件是否应检索所有数据行的计数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data source control should retrieve a count of all the data rows during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 如果数据源控件应检索数据行总数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data source control should retrieve a total data row count; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 将此属性设置为 `true` ，以在数据检索操作过程中在数据源控件中请求总行数。Set this property to `true` to request a total row count from the data source control during the data-retrieval operation. 检查 属性以确定数据源视图是否支持检索总行数。Check the property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count. 如果数据源支持该属性，则在 数据检索操作过程中，数据源控件将设置该属性，并且在属性中返回总计数据行计数 ，就像在方法的 output 参数中返回值一样。If the data source supports it, the property is set by the data source control during the course of a data retrieval operation and the total data row count is returned in the property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果设置了任何 属性，但当前绑定的数据源控件不支持所请求的功能，则 调用方法时将引发异常 。If any of the properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an exception is thrown when the method is called.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表达式，数据源视图使用该表达式对 方法检索的数据进行排序。

span.span: Gets or sets an expression that the data source view uses to sort the data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 一个字符串，数据源视图使用该字符串对 方法检索的数据进行排序。

span.span: A string that the data source view uses to sort data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 如果未设置排序表达式，则返回 。

span.span: is returned if sort expression has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持排序方案。The property supports sorting scenarios.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示在数据检索操作过程中，检索数据行时数据源控件应使用的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the starting position the data source control should use when retrieving data rows during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 数据源控件检索数据的起始行位置。

span.span: The starting row position from which a data source control retrieves data.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示起始位置为结果集的开始处。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that the starting position is the beginning of the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 数据绑定控件在运行时检查数据源视图的 属性， 如果视图支持分页，则使用方法添加功能。Data-bound controls check a data source view's property at run time, and add a capability using the method if the view supports paging. 如果数据绑定控件未能添加功能，并且在 数据检索操作过程中在传递到数据源视图的对象上设置分页属性，则 可能会引发异常。If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an exception might be thrown. 作为单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以通过设置 传递给方法的对象的和属性来请求数据源控件中的数据子集 。As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control by setting the and properties on the object passed to the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置在数据检索操作过程中检索的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows retrieved during a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 数据检索操作检索的数据行总数。

span.span: The total number of data rows retrieved by the data retrieval operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持分页方案。The property supports paging scenarios. 数据源和数据源视图控件在其内部实现方面有所不同，以了解如何检索总行数。Data source and data source view controls differ in their internal implementation for how to retrieve total row counts. 检查 属性以确定数据源视图是否支持在数据检索操作过程中检索总行数。Check the property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count during a data-retrieval operation. 如果数据源支持该属性，则在 数据检索操作过程中，数据源控件将设置该属性，并且在属性中返回总计数据行计数， 就像在方法的 output 参数中返回值一样。If the data source supports it, the property is set by the data source control during the course of a data-retrieval operation, and the total data row count is returned in the property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
